title: I need to know if Repairtech in Bangalore is a certified Google service center.
content:
Trying to understand if they are genuine service centre as they claim to be. They have talked to me and tred convincing me to be the authorised service center. I do have whatsapp chat as well, but then I have logged a case with Google and the phone is sent for a screen replacement to Mumbai. This is their website.
http://googlepixel.co.in/
